name: Fetch EPG

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 */6 * * *" # every 6 hours
  workflow_dispatch: # allows manual run

jobs:
  fetch:
    runs-on: windows-latest

    steps:
      # 1️⃣ Checkout the repository
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3

      # 2️⃣ Setup Node.js
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '20'

      # 3️⃣ Install dependencies
      - run: npm install axios iconv-lite epg-parser pako dayjs xmlbuilder

      # 4️⃣ Run the EPG fetcher
      - run: node fetch_epg.js

      # 5️⃣ Commit and push generated XML files
      - run: |
          git config --local user.name "github-actions"
          git config --local user.email "github-actions@github.com"
          git add *.xml
          git commit -m "Update XMLTV [skip ci]" || echo "No changes"
          git push
